question: Jay Om Prakash, who passed away recently, was the veteran  personality of which field?
explanation: Jay Om Prakash (93), the veteran  filmmaker and Hrithik Roshan\'s maternal grandfather, has passed away in Mumbai, Maharashtra on August 7, 2019. He is best known for his collaboration with two of Bollywood biggest superstars -- the late Rajesh Khanna and Jeetendra. He had a strong penchant for beginning his film titles with the letter \'A\'. With Khanna, he made films such as \"Aap Ki Kasam\" (1974) and \"Aakhir Kyon?\" (1985). His collaboration with Jeetendra yielded five big hits -- \"Apnapan\" (1977), \"Aasha\" (1980), \"Apna Bana Lo\" (1982), \"Arpan\" (1983) and \"Aadmi Khilona Hai\" (1993).
